description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows OLE remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-21372):

1. Download and install the relevant KB update based on your Windows version:
   - [KB5034765 for Windows 11 Version 23H2]
   - [KB5034763 for Windows 10 Version 22H2]
   - [KB5034766 for Windows 11 Version 21H2]
   - [KB5034774 for Windows 10 for x64 and 32-bit Systems]

2. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.

3. Restart your computer to ensure all updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an integer overflow issue within Windows OLE that could allow remote code execution.
- It is important to apply the patch promptly to safeguard against potential exploits.

You can find the update packages at the following links:
- [KB5034765 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
- [KB5034763 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
- [KB5034766 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
- [KB5034774 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your Windows version aligns with the KB articles prior to installation.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update.
